about: Student, I am enrolled in a Computer Science Teaching Degree at the Federal Institute of Bahia, Sr. do Bonfim campus. I have 4 years of experience as a Frontend/Backend Developer, including 2 years in a software house and 2 years as a freelancer. I have worked on projects involving dashboards, service management, sales control, landing pages, and SaaS in general. My main technologies include: NextJS, ReactJS, and TypeScript. I have knowledge in Python, Django, Docker, Jest, Testing Library, Prisma, Express, and NestJS. I am communicative and enjoy helping, as well as valuing transparency in information. Additionally, I learn and adapt quickly to changes.
current: I am currently a FullStack intern at JackExperts, a company that works with DevOps solutions. Additionally, I am a scholarship holder in the Tutorial Education Program (PET), a group that aims to disseminate and promote Media Literacy.
